entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the recipient of a letter, and his behavior is described in relation to reading the letter.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people who read the letter with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people who read the letter with Harry.

entities.name: minister of magic
entities.description: The Minister of Magic is mentioned as the source of information about Ron's prefect position.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is mentioned as the teacher who informed the Minister of Magic about Ron's prefect position.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are mentioned as an example of a path that Ron could have taken instead of becoming a prefect.

relationships.description: The Minister of Magic informed Harry about Ron's prefect position.
Professor Umbridge informed the Minister of Magic about Ron's prefect position.
Ron took a different path than Fred and George by becoming a prefect instead of following in his father's footsteps.
